title: Textile, "Jeux d'enfants", 1770–83
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation
dimensions: Height of panel: 249 cm (98 1/4 in.). Width of panel: 222 cm (87 1/2 in.). Pattern: height of repeat and printing plate: 95 cm (37 1/2 in.). No width of repeat present in each length but fabric designed so that pattern forms a half-drop repeat. Width of complete length (and of pattern repeat): 93 cm (36 1/2 in.).
description: Panel made of one complete and three incomplete lengths of this fabric. Design of children playing several kinds of games around a large gnarled tree. Many small birds in design. In red on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Jeux d'enfants", 1770–83.
1770–83. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-41.
